about_the_game:
WARNING

PLEASE READ CAREFULLY BEFORE USING
Epileptic seizures associated with increased sensitivity to light are possible. Some people may experience seizures when exposed to flashes of light and flashing images that appear in video games. People who have not previously experienced such attacks may not be aware of their illness. If you have ever had epileptic seizures, consult your doctor before playing. Persons under the age of 16, pregnant women and people with a weak mind are not recommended to play.

Average time to complete the game: 120 minutes

"Biological Incident" is a psychological thriller from the first person. The game takes place in the southern Urals in 2018. The player will have to explore the places that were part of the mysterious events.

2018 has become one of the scariest years for a small town in the wilderness. The locals will not soon forget these events. In the last six months alone, 12 people have disappeared. The police can't get on the trail because someone or something leaves no trace. However, after the disappearance of the twelfth person, the police still managed to get on the trail. According to eyewitnesses, the missing man was seen near a house on the outskirts of the city.

You will play as Vladimir, a brave young man who, despite the panic in the city, helped the police in the search for the missing. Unfortunately, the police did not find anything in the house. The young man decided to start his own investigation and went to the house alone at night. He had no idea who or what was really involved in these disappearances.

Features of the game:

  • You have to look for clues;
  • From time to time, you will defend yourself from enemies using a pistol;
  • You will dive into the past and visit the place of one researcher;
  • You will find out the secret of the Lazorev family, and how they are involved in this case;
  • Explore those old places that are more involved than they seem;
  • Will you find the old notes;

name: Biological Incident

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 10
  • Processor: Intel Core-i5 2320
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia Gtx 580 ti
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Cases of disappearances have become more frequent in the small town. The tracks lead to an empty house on the outskirts of the city...
